ussr.model
Class NativeController

java.lang.Object
  ussr.model.NativeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
ATRONNativeController, OdinNativeController
public class NativeController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller

A controller with a native implementation, bridged to a controller implementing the NativeControllerProvider interface.

Author:
Modular Robots @ MMMI

activate

public void activate()
Description copied from interface: Controller
This method is called by the simulator in a separate thread, and should define the computations performed by the module. Activate will only be called once the hardware has been set up.

Specified by:
activate in interface Controller
See Also:
Controller.setModule(Module)
